attributes.review: I think Trump is such a terrific president and I was thrilled when I discovered he had is very own app! but when I downloaded it, immediately I was disappointed. my facial expression went from this ğŸ™‚ to this ğŸ˜‘ğŸ˜¬ so basically it was an ordinary day in the life of me. I did what I usually do, I hat some oatmeal for breakfast while updating my blog, I went for a walk with my tiny small dog and when I got home, my kids were playing soccer so I decided I could be on my phone for a little bit by the pool. I was on Facebook and I just finished attacking my Facebook friend, April for posting about black lives matter. we get it April, you voted for Bernie and your political views are wrongğŸ™„ I soon got an add for my precious little TrumpyğŸ˜ I quick clicked on the link faster than you could imagine to download this â€œsplendidâ€ app. I even deleted a few pictures of my daughters Mckkinleeigh and EmilÃ©e for extra space for this â€œsplendidâ€ app. once it appeared on my home screen without a loading icon, I clicked on it with extra speed of my finger. about after a half hour of exploring this â€œsplendidâ€ app, I was done. is our racist, homophobic, sexist, sexual predator president really like this? he really made this app with no effort? I never thought he would do something like this. I feel betrayed. betrayal from the love of my life Donald J. Trump. I will no longer be allowing Mckkinleeigh or EmilÃ©e or Khristyan (my son I didnâ€™t mention before) to watch Little Rascals because of his appearance. I will still be voting for him, but I do feel a sense of betrayal. please do not download.
